title: mAnamutO nannu
sahitya:
mAnamutO nannu brOvarAdA dIna bAndhava shrI vAsudEvA


anupallavi

  shrI nikEtana nI nAmamu prEmatO dhyAnamu sEyuTa su-jnAna mosaga rAdA


caraNam    vAridhi shayana vArja lOcana vArida durjana vara khaga vAhana 
kari moraliDa nIvu karuNatO brOvalEdA parama puruSa ninnE nammina vADugadA
